creator: Eğitim  Yazılımları
descriptionHtml:
Optical form reading application for teachers

https://testplus.top
You Can Download Ready Optical Forms From Our Site

Help Videos
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0SQ5nCH8estIuA05IYQSnNbDp-9v3Rsw

Beware, you may encounter some unexpected problems. Please feel free to report issues to testplus.top@gmail.com.
The problems you report will be quickly fixed and an update will be published.

With the application, you can read an unlimited number of papers without paying any fee. When you first install the application, you have the right to read optical forms from 100+5 cameras and 50+5 images. If you do not want to pay when these rights expire, you have to wait 5 minutes after every 5 optical forms are scanned, but if you watch a short advertisement, you can continue reading without having to wait for the time.

Features to be Added in the Far Future
* Cloud-based automatic backup
* Reporting via PC with web interface

Optical reader application for teachers
* You can create student information using advanced optical forms

* You can automatically receive student parents' phones via e-school. You can automatically send the exam results to parents via WhatsApp or SMS.

* If you want, you can use the advanced optical forms (include Name, Surname, Class, Number information) and save the student information through the optical forms and save them in the students section.

* If you want, you can use ready-made optical forms, or you can design your own optical forms. You can freely specify the marking patterns (such as ABCDE , ABCD , ABC ).

* You can transfer students to the application via the excel file or to excel files via the application.

* You can export and print optical forms in A4 - A5 - A6 - A7 Format.

* By combining optical forms in A5, A6, A7 sizes, you can print 2, 4, 8 optical forms at once.

* If you want, you can print the student information of the classes you have chosen in coded form by pressing the optical forms.

* While entering the answer key, you can cancel the wrong or erroneous questions or have them counted as correct.

* As soon as students submit the optical form, you can read and score the optical form.

* You can get the reports of your exams in PDF and EXCEL format.

* If you have taken more than one exam in the same class, you can compare these exams with each other. You can report averages of exams or all exams of a student.

* You can take exams in which there are more than one lesson. You can scan optical forms in image format with the scanner, transfer them to your phone and read all papers at once.

* You can manually back up your data and restore these backups as needed

INNOVATIONS
BUG FIXES
- Fixed the issue where the answer key was not displayed in the Student Results report.
- Added labels to some buttons for screen readers (We will continue to add labels)

NEWLY ADDED FEATURES
- Prevented the application from going to sleep mode on the camera screen.
- Added the option to enlarge the form when exporting optical forms.
- The ability to share the answer key as a QR code has been added to the Answers screen.
- The ability to change the exam has been added to the Answers, Papers and Reports screen.
- The menus on the screens have been simplified.
descriptionShort: Fast and Practical Optical Exam Reader

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Kağıt detay ekranında cevap anahtarı bilgisini görüntüleyebilirsiniz. Ayarı aktif yaparsanız cevap anahtarı yeşil renkte görüntülenir. Kamera ekranında ayarlar altından 'Cevap Anahtarını İşaretle' seçeneğini aktif ederseniz öğrenci cevapları ile cevap anahtarı aynı anda görüntülenebilir

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Yeni Eklenen Özellikler
* E-okul işlemlerinde sadece belirli öğrencilerin bilgilerinin alınabilmesi özelliği eklendi
* Soru ve Cevap analiz raporlarına hücreye dokunma özelliği
* Sınava girmeyenler raporu için yuvarlama ayarı
* Kağıtları dışarı aktarma ekranı için yuvarlama ayarı
* Cevap anahtarını optik formdan alma işlemi iyileştirildi
* Yardım belgeleri düzenlendi

Düzeltmeler
* Abonelik bilgilerini görme ve yönetme işlemleri iyileştirildi
* Soru ve Cevap analiz raporları iyileştirildi

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

* Added the ability to directly transfer the answer key and optical form design to the application

* Sınavlar ekranına sınav grubu üzerine tıklandığında sekmeyi genişletebilme ayarı eklendi

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Newly Added Features
* Blur and glare detection adjustment from camera to scan screen
* Ability to swipe action button on quizzes and papers screen
* Setting icons to scan settings
* Improvements have been made to the feature of accepting deleted fields as full

Fixes
* Fixed student question analysis report sorting issue
* Fixed the issue where the paper images looked the same when returning from the camera screen to the papers screen

* You can export and print optical forms in A4 - A5 - A6 - A7 Format.

* By combining optical forms in A5, A6, A7 sizes, you can print 2, 4, 8 optical forms at once.

* If you want, you can print the student information of the classes you have chosen in coded form by pressing the optical forms.

* While entering the answer key, you can cancel the wrong or erroneous questions or have them counted as correct.

* As soon as students submit the optical form, you can read and score the optical form.

* You can get the reports of your exams in PDF and EXCEL format.

* If you have taken more than one exam in the same class, you can compare these exams with each other. You can report averages of exams or all exams of a student.

* You can take exams in which there are more than one lesson. You can scan optical forms in image format with the scanner, transfer them to your phone and read all papers at once.

* You can manually back up your data and restore these backups as needed

INNOVATIONS
BUG FIXES
- Fixed the issue where the answer key was not displayed in the Student Results report.
- Added labels to some buttons for screen readers (We will continue to add labels)

NEWLY ADDED FEATURES
- Prevented the application from going to sleep mode on the camera screen.
- Added the option to enlarge the form when exporting optical forms.
- The ability to share the answer key as a QR code has been added to the Answers screen.
- The ability to change the exam has been added to the Answers, Papers and Reports screen.
- The menus on the screens have been simplified.
descriptionShort: Fast and Practical Optical Exam Reader

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Newly Added Features
* Added ability to create online exams
* Added the ability to send exams to students and their parents via the 'Test Time' application
* Added 'Test Time' menu to students screen

Fixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

* Added sync button to get student answers under the menu on the papers screen for online exams

Optical reader application for teachers
* You can create student information using advanced optical forms

* You can automatically receive student parents' phones via e-school. You can automatically send the exam results to parents via WhatsApp or SMS.

* If you want, you can use the advanced optical forms (include Name, Surname, Class, Number information) and save the student information through the optical forms and save them in the students section.

* If you want, you can use ready-made optical forms, or you can design your own optical forms. You can freely specify the marking patterns (such as ABCDE , ABCD , ABC ).

* You can transfer students to the application via the excel file or to excel files via the application.

* You can export and print optical forms in A4 - A5 - A6 - A7 Format.

* By combining optical forms in A5, A6, A7 sizes, you can print 2, 4, 8 optical forms at once.

* If you want, you can print the student information of the classes you have chosen in coded form by pressing the optical forms.

* While entering the answer key, you can cancel the wrong or erroneous questions or have them counted as correct.

* As soon as students submit the optical form, you can read and score the optical form.

* You can get the reports of your exams in PDF and EXCEL format.

* If you have taken more than one exam in the same class, you can compare these exams with each other. You can report averages of exams or all exams of a student.

* You can take exams in which there are more than one lesson. You can scan optical forms in image format with the scanner, transfer them to your phone and read all papers at once.

* You can manually back up your data and restore these backups as needed

INNOVATIONS
BUG FIXES
- Fixed the issue where the answer key was not displayed in the Student Results report.
- Added labels to some buttons for screen readers (We will continue to add labels)

NEWLY ADDED FEATURES
- Prevented the application from going to sleep mode on the camera screen.
- Added the option to enlarge the form when exporting optical forms.
- The ability to share the answer key as a QR code has been added to the Answers screen.
- The ability to change the exam has been added to the Answers, Papers and Reports screen.
- The menus on the screens have been simplified.
descriptionShort: Fast and Practical Optical Exam Reader

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Newly Added Features
* Added modern theme view
* Added phone number length setting

Fixes
* Improved sync system

title: Test Plus - Exam Reader

creator: Eğitim  Yazılımları
descriptionHtml:
Optical form reading application for teachers

https://testplus.top
You Can Download Ready Optical Forms From Our Site

Help Videos
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0SQ5nCH8estIuA05IYQSnNbDp-9v3Rsw

Beware, you may encounter some unexpected problems. Please feel free to report issues to testplus.top@gmail.com.
The problems you report will be quickly fixed and an update will be published.

With the application, you can read an unlimited number of papers without paying any fee. When you first install the application, you have the right to read optical forms from 100+5 cameras and 50+5 images. If you do not want to pay when these rights expire, you have to wait 5 minutes after every 5 optical forms are scanned, but if you watch a short advertisement, you can continue reading without having to wait for the time.

Features to be Added in the Far Future
* Cloud-based automatic backup
* Reporting via PC with web interface

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Newly Added Features
* Added the ability to disable the unanswered questions setting during the paper reading process.
* Paper scanning notification from the camera has been edited

Corrections
* Fixed the course ordering error that could occur due to reading with different optical forms in multiple course exams.

title: Test Plus - Exam Reader

creator: Eğitim Yazılım
descriptionHtml:
Optical test reader for teachers. You can instantly read multiple choice tests using optical forms and grade students. You can read your tests instantly in the classroom. As soon as the student submits the optical form, you can scan the optical form in the classroom with the device camera and tell the student his exam grade. You can give quizzes to your students and calculate their quiz grades instantly. You can scan the optical forms filled out by the student for the quiz with your phone's camera and instantly grade the student's answers.

You can read the exam answer keys on the optical form with the camera. You can cancel incorrect questions or count them as correct while entering the answer key.

Teachers can design your own optical forms. You can adjust the number of questions of the optical form and the number of options for the questions as you wish. You can place description fields and student photos on the optical form. If you want, you can create optical forms filled with student information.

If you work in more than one school, you can add all of these schools to the application. At the stage of adding an exam or quiz, you can select the school you want and define the exam only for this school. Teachers can transfer school and student information to the application via Excel file.

You can report the results of the tests in pdf or excel format. In the reports, you can sort the students by student number, name, surname or exam grade information. You can group student exam or quiz papers based on class. Teachers can share test or exam results with students' parents via WhatsApp or SMS message, if they wish. You can send the test reports specially created for each student, along with the optical form pictures, to the students' parents via WhatsApp. If you want, you can send online exams or homework to students without an optical form with the TEST TIME application. This way you can calculate students' grades. Teachers can share the results of their homework or regular exams with students' parents via TEST TIME

If you pay, you can scan an unlimited number of student papers without any restrictions during the subscription period. When TestPlus is installed for the first time, it gives you the right to read 100 papers. When your rights expire, you can continue reading optical forms by waiting or watching ads.
descriptionShort: Multiple choice exam reader for teachers. Instantly scan and grade quizzes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Newly Added Features
* If there is more than one student with the same number under the school, the ability to select the student while reading has been added
* Added preview video to the learn now screen
* Added other apps screen
* Added the feature of assigning random numbers to unnumbered students in the process of importing students from Excel.

Correction
* Course results report corrected
* Arrangements regarding languages have been made
* Date formats updated

descriptionShort: Multiple choice exam reader for teachers. Instantly scan and grade quizzes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New Features
• Added the ability to send bulk SMS with Twillo
• Added the ability to create score-based development reports
• Added the ability to disable phone number control
• Added a grouping setting to the student results report
• Added the ability to see the device status of students with a Test Time account

Fixes
• Reorganized the screen for sending messages to parents
• Fixed the error that occurred during the sbsd file import phase
